name: Microbin
short_desc: A secure, configurable file-sharing and URL shortening web app written in Rust.
author: szabodanika
description: MicroBin is a super tiny, feature-rich, configurable, self-contained and self-hosted paste bin web application. It is very easy to set up and use, and will only require a few megabytes of memory and disk storage.
